RelatedSentence: Former Rep. Bob Barr is attempting to return to Congress after a 12 - year hiatus with his bid Tuesday in the Republican primary for an open House seat in Georgia .
Barr and one of the other three leading GOP contenders in suburban Atlanta 's 11th Congressional District would then meet in a runoff in July to determine their party 's nominee .
The Republican most likely to make the runoff with Barr seems to be former state Sen. Barry Loudermilk , who resigned from office last year to campaign full - time for Congress .
The Republican most likely to make the runoff with Barr seems to be former state Sen. Barry Loudermilk , who resigned from office last year to campaign full - time for Congress .
A U.S. Air Force veteran and small - businessman , Loudermilk has strong support among cultural conservatives and several tea party groups .

As for Holder , Barr wrote in Townhall that my letter was based on my professional association with Holder during his time as an attorney in private practice during the Bush administration .
However , he added , in June 2013 , I was one of the first to call for Holder 's resignation at the Department of Justice .
I repeat that call today .
Barr cited Holder 's role in Operation Fast and Furious and what he called turning a blind eye to Black Panther voter intimidation as two of the reasons he now says Holder must go .
